TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEditable

summary.span: 提供介面給開發人員，以指定與 控制項相關聯的自訂編輯控制項。

span.span: Provides an interface for developers to specify custom editing controls that are associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓您將自訂控制項與伺服器控制項-例如控制項、 使用者控制項或自訂伺服器控制項。The interface enables you to associate custom controls with a server control--such as a control, a user control, or a custom server control. 控制項包含與控制項和其編輯控制項與這個區域提供使用者介面 (UI) 的使用者修改內容、 外觀，以及相關聯的行為控制項。The controls are contained with an control, and this zone with its editing controls provides end users with a user interface (UI) for modifying properties, appearance, and behavior on the associated control. 介面包含兩個公開的成員。The interface includes two exposed members. 屬性可讓控制項，以取得相關聯的伺服器控制項的參考。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the associated server control. 方法用來建立每個自訂的執行個體控制項相關聯的伺服器控制項，並將其傳回做為集合。The method is used to create an instance of each custom control associated with a server control, and return them as a collection. 介面已實作基底上類別，雖然根據預設，此實作不關聯任何自訂控制與類別。The interface is already implemented on the base class, although by default this implementation does not associate any custom controls with the class. 若要建立關聯的衍生控制項使用的自訂控制項，您可以覆寫方法。To associate a derived control with custom controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫的方法中自訂介面控制項，然後建立自訂的執行個體負責控制何時控制項進入編輯模式。The following code example demonstrates how to override the methods of the interface in a custom control, which then creates an instance of a custom control when the control enters edit mode. 這個範例有四個部分：This example has four parts: - 自訂類別的程式碼。The code for the custom class. - 裝載自訂控制項的 Web 網頁。The Web page that hosts the custom control. - 使用者控制項的網頁切換至編輯模式。A user control that switches the page into edit mode. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是 custom`TextDisplayWebPart`類別。The first part of the code example is the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` class. 請注意，此類別衍生自類別，並且實作介面，提供特定實作方法和屬性。Notice that the class derives from the class and implements the interface, providing specific implementations for the method and the property. 請注意也，巢狀方式置於`TextDisplayWebPart`類別是私用，自訂`TextDisplayEditorPart`衍生自基底類別類別。Notice also that nested within the `TextDisplayWebPart` class is a private, custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` class that derives from the base class. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是裝載自訂控制項的網頁。The second part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the custom control. 請注意，雖然 頁面上，自訂標記中宣告控制項控制項需要無法加以參考，因為它在執行階段可以透過程式設計方式加入。Notice that although an control is declared in the markup of the page, the custom control need not be referenced there, because it can be added programmatically at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#7)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者將網頁切換至編輯模式。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables a user to switch the page into edit mode. 請注意，要將使用者控制項參考中裝載的 Web 網頁。Notice that the user control is referenced in the hosting Web page. 如需如何建立這個使用者控制項的完整說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For a full description of how to create this user control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/displaymodeuccs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/displaymodeucvb.ascx#8)] 若要執行的程式碼範例，載入裝載的 Web 網頁瀏覽器中，加入一些文字到文字方塊中，並按一下**設定標籤內容**按鈕以更新控制項中的標籤。To run the code example, load the hosting Web page in a browser, add some text to the text box, and click the **Set Label Content** button to update the label in the control. 若要將頁面切換至編輯模式中，選取**編輯**與下拉式清單中的顯示模式。To switch the page into edit mode, select **Edit** from the drop-down list containing the display modes. 若要顯示來自自訂 UI`TextDisplayEditorPart`控制，請按一下動詞命令功能表下拉式箭頭`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後選取**編輯**。To display the UI from the custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` control, click the verbs menu drop-down arrow on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and select **Edit**. 在編輯的 UI 中，您可以使用包含的字型樣式的下拉式清單來更新中的標籤的文字樣式`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。In the editing UI, you can use the drop-down list containing the font styles to update the text style for the label in the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 您必須按一下**瀏覽模式**頁面返回正常檢視，並確認標籤中的文字現在有的字型樣式的顯示模式 下拉式清單中選取處於編輯模式。You must click **Browse Mode** in the display modes drop-down list to return the page to normal view and confirm that the text in the label now has the font style you selected while in edit mode.

para.span: 如果您想要使用的不是伺服器控制項Web 組件的應用程式中的控制項 (亦即，如果您將這些控制項加入區域)，而且如果您想要將自訂有這類伺服器控制項的控制項，您需要實作介面。

span.span: If you want to use server controls that are not controls in a Web Parts application (that is, if you add these controls to a zone), and if you want to associate custom controls with such server controls, you need to implement the interface.

para.span: 衍生控制項應該不會實作介面，因為基底類別已經這樣做。

span.span: Derived controls should not implement the interface, because the base class already does so.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回與伺服器控制項相關聯之自訂 控制項的集合，該伺服器控制項會實作 介面。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls associated with a server control that implements the interface.

returns.span: ，包含與伺服器控制項相關聯之自訂 控制項的集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您建立的所有自訂集合與您的自訂控制項相關聯控制項控制項或使用者控制項，並傳回它們作為物件。The method enables you to create a collection of all the custom controls associated with your custom control, control, or user control, and return them as an object. 控制項採用集合，並建立的所有執行個體控制項，只要伺服器控制項進入編輯模式。The control takes the collection and creates instances of all the controls whenever the server control enters edit mode. 在自訂中實作這個方法通常控制項，藉由覆寫其方法。Typically you implement this method in a custom control by overriding its method. 在方法中，您可以建立自訂的執行個體您想要將與您的控制項產生關聯的控制項加入至物件，並會傳回該物件。In the method, you create instances of the custom controls you want to associate with your controls, add them to an object, and then return that object. 集合控制項接著會指派給屬性區域。The collection of controls is then assigned to the property of the zone. > [!NOTE] > 任何加入至集合的的實作中的控制項方法必須有指派給它的 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中自訂方法控制項。The following code example demonstrates an override of the method in a custom control. 若要執行範例所需的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀主題。The complete source code required to run the sample is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 程式碼範例包含兩個成員介面。The code example contains both members of the interface. 請注意，覆寫方法會建立收集一個或多個自訂控制項，並接著會使用清單來建立物件。Note that the override of the method creates an to collect one or more custom controls, and then uses the list to create the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 物件方法會傳回處於唯讀狀態且個別的控制項加入任何可存取的方法。

span.span: The object that the method returns is read-only and has no accessible method to add individual controls to it.

para.span: 不過，在覆寫或實作的方法中，您可以建立另一種類型的物件，例如，包含所有自訂控制項，並將它傳遞至建構函式，當您建立新物件.

span.span: However, in your override or implementation of the method, you can create another kind of object, such as an , to contain all the custom controls, and pass it to the constructor when you create a new object.

para.span: 如需程式碼範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

span.span: For a code example, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項、使用者控制項或自訂控制項的參考，這項參考將會由 控制項進行編輯。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control, user control, or custom control that will be edited by controls.

value.span: 與 控制項相關聯之控制項的物件參考。

span.span: An object reference to the control associated with an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓控制項，以取得相關聯的伺服器控制項的參考。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the server controls they are associated with. 雖然本身的屬性是唯讀，則會傳回的物件參考可讓控制項，以變更伺服器控制項中的值。Although the property itself is read-only, the object reference that it returns enables controls to change values in the server control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何屬性會覆寫自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be overridden in a custom control. 若要執行範例所需的完整原始程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀主題。The complete source code required to run the example is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 程式碼範例會覆寫的成員介面。The code example overrides both members of the interface. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 一般來說，當您實作伺服器控制項中的屬性，您就只會傳回伺服器控制項本身的參考。

span.span: Normally, when you implement the property in a server control, you simply return a reference to the server control itself.

para.span: 如果是類別，因為它所包裝的子控制項，讓它當做控制，其實作的屬性傳回的子控制項的參考。

span.span: In the case of the class, because it wraps a child control to enable it to function as a control, its implementation of the property returns a reference to the child control.
